snippet.title: Can We Sing the Darkness to Light (mini-documentary) | Kyle Pederson
snippet.description:
Composer Kyle Pederson speaks on the inspiration for his work, Can We Sing the Darkness to Light, in this new mini-documentary. "I wanted to invite people to think about a world, not only without weapons and violence, but also without judgements, and more healthy ways of being in community - peace and compassion, grace and empathy." -Kyle Pederson

Performance by Transept, conducted by Timothy J. Campbell. Watch the full performance: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IuEDkY7cwMs

Video production by Brian Gaukel. 

Purchase the music: https://giamusic.com/resource/can-we-sing-the-darkness-to-light-print-ww1736
